casebody.data:
Dorothy HAWTHORNE-BURDINE, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
OAKLAND UNIVERSITY, Defendant-Appellee. Dorothy Hawthorne-Burdine, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Oakland University, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 157848, SC: 157849
COA: 338605, COA: 339188 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 30, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the April 17, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
